title: PSA: All skins that are scheduled to be on sale soon are being replaced in your Lunar Revel Shop
body:
Hey everyone,

Seeing some posts about sales changing in your Lunar Revel shop. The skins that are being **replaced** in your Lunar Revel Shop are scheduled to go on sale either in January or February. We don't want you to get a Lunar Revel sale only to see it in a regular sale over the next few days, so we have replaced those sales in the Lunar Revel Shop with different offers.

P.S. these were my sales! what were yours?

http://i.imgur.com/gC43okC.png
